B

BatteryThermostat - Static variable in class org.remoteHome.AbstractDevice
This device type is battery thermostat, connected to power line
BatteryThermostatDevice - Class in org.remoteHome
pn - check weather the device is up and running (ping command)
o - Switch on the relay f - Switch off the relay s - return status 7|temperature|battery|frequency|expected temperature|relay|threshold
temperature format - 3 decimals degree celsius, e.g 233 = 23.3 or -23 = -23 or 022 = 2.2
battery voltage e.g.
BatteryThermostatDevice(RemoteHomeManager, int, String) - Constructor for class org.remoteHome.BatteryThermostatDevice
The constructor is protected.
BlindsControllerDevice - Static variable in class org.remoteHome.AbstractDevice
This device type is blinds controller
BlindsControllerDevice - Class in org.remoteHome
Blinds controller

pn - check weather the device is up and runing (ping command)
s - return status 5|down|up|timeout value|current opening
   down - 1 if currently moving down
   up - 1 if currently moving up
   timeout value - number of configured timeout in sec.
BlindsControllerDevice(RemoteHomeManager, int, String) - Constructor for class org.remoteHome.BlindsControllerDevice
The constructor is protected.
BlindsControllerDeviceManager - Class in org.remoteHome.gui
 
BlindsControllerDeviceManager() - Constructor for class org.remoteHome.gui.BlindsControllerDeviceManager
 
BlindsControllerListener - Interface in org.remoteHome
This interface should be implemented in order to receive asynchronous event, when the blind are set to required position.
blindsDown() - Method in class org.remoteHome.BlindsControllerDevice
This method will move the blinds to fully closed position
blindsPositioned() - Method in interface org.remoteHome.BlindsControllerListener
This method is called by the API, when blinds are in required position.
blindsUp() - Method in class org.remoteHome.BlindsControllerDevice
This method will move the blinds to fully opened position
